title: Rural Road Infrastructure Development Project
description: This project aims to improve rural connectivity and market access through the rehabilitation and upgrading of 150km of rural roads in southeastern Costa Rica. It will benefit approximately 35 rural communities with a population of 50,000.

participating_org_funding: Ministry of Public Works and Transportation, Costa Rica
transaction_value: Initial disbursement for preliminary studies and design
transaction_description: Improved travel time reduced by 40% on target routes
